name: sandys-pet-care-solution
description: Sandy's Pet Care Solution - A full-stack e-commerce website for pet supplies

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run test:unit && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
